item.title: Four-Cheese Cheesy Shells
item.description: This is a pretty awesome mac and cheese recipe. It’s got tons of flavor, and it uses shell pasta instead of elbow macaroni because shells are the superior shape (I will die on this hill). It’s extra saucy, because the saucier the better. It’s salty, cheesy, and has a bit of a kick (adjustable levels!) Peak comfort food right here.

item.title: Creamy Tomato Penne
item.description: I love pasta alla vodka, but it does require two pots – one to boil the water, and one to mix the sauce. I was craving a good tomatoey pasta the other night, and I happened to have the idea to try a one-pot version, where the pasta cooks in the sauce (please don’t come for me, Italians.) The pasta turned out delicious, and it was so easy to make that I knew I had to put it in a recipe!
